permissions.header_content: Note: Disabling permissions is a permanent decision

charge_market_fee.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable charging market trading fees for this asset.
charge_market_fee.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to charge market trading fees for this asset.

white_list.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable configuring white list authorities for this asset.
white_list.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to configure white list authorities for this asset.

override_authority.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable the ability to perform an override transfer operation on this asset, returning it to their balance from yours.
override_authority.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to perform override transfer operations on this asset.

transfer_restricted.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable the ability to restrict transfers of this asset.
transfer_restricted.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to restrict transfers of this asset.

disable_confidential.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable the ability to disable confidential operations for this asset.
disable_confidential.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to disable confidential operations for this asset.

witness_fed_asset.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable witnesses to publish price feeds for this asset.
witness_fed_asset.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to enable witnesses to publish price feed for this asset.

committee_fed_asset.enabledInfo: It's possible for the asset creator to enable committee members to publish price feeds for this asset.
committee_fed_asset.disabledInfo: It's now impossible for the asset creator to enable committee members to publish price feeds for this asset.

flags.header_content: Each allowed asset permission can be toggled on/off.

charge_market_fee.enabledInfo: The asset creator can configure market trading fees for this asset, including market fee reward sharing functionality.
charge_market_fee.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled charging market trading fees for this asset.

white_list.enabledInfo: The asset creator can configure white list authorities for this asset.
white_list.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled configuring white list authorities for this asset.

override_authority.enabledInfo: The asset creator can perform an override transfer operation on this asset, returning it to their balance from yours.
override_authority.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled performing override transfer operations on this asset.

transfer_restricted.enabledInfo: The asset creator can restrict transfers of this asset.
transfer_restricted.disabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled restricting transfers of this asset.

disable_confidential.enabledInfo: The asset creator has disabled confidential operations for this asset.
disable_confidential.disabledInfo: The asset creator hasn't disabled confidential operations for this asset.

witness_fed_asset.enabledInfo: Witnesses are able to publish price feeds for this asset.
witness_fed_asset.disabledInfo: Witnesses are unable to publish price feed for this asset.

committee_fed_asset.enabledInfo: Committee members are able to publish price feeds for this asset.
committee_fed_asset.disabledInfo: Committee members are unable to publish price feeds for this asset.
